thread.title: Watch Riz Ahmed Rap Twista’s Verse on Kanye’s “Slow Jamz” on “Girls”
thread.title_full: Watch Riz Ahmed Rap Twista’s Verse on Kanye’s “Slow Jamz” on “Girls”

author: Matthew Strauss
title: Watch Riz Ahmed Rap Twista’s Verse on Kanye’s “Slow Jamz” on “Girls”
text:
Watch Riz Ahmed Rap Twista’s Verse on Kanye’s “Slow Jamz” on “Girls” He plays a surf instructor on the final season of Lena Dunham’s HBO drama Riz MC Photo by Mark Schafer 
Last night, the first episode of the final season of “ Girls ” premiered on HBO. Guest starring on the new season is Rogue One and “The Night Of” star Riz Ahmed (aka Riz MC of Swet Shop Boys ). He plays a surf instructor named Paul-Louis. In one scene, he flexes his lyrical ability, rapping Twista ’s verse from Kanye West ’s “Slow Jamz” (from The College Dropout ). Watch Riz spit Twista below (via Stereogum ).
